name: Dance Tap Revolution
description:
Listen to music and dance like a true pro. Get your timing just right and you'll unlock cool new dance moves & increase your popularity with the crowd. Complete music tracks to unlock even more songs to dance to. What are you waiting for? Dance!

Features:
- Lots of songs to unlock
- Stunning graphics & effects
- 3 Dancers
- Fun, Familiar game style
- 100% Free to play!
